title: How to Win a 1 vs. 1 Battle in Warcraft 3 as an Orc

steps.headline: Put two peons mining gold, one building an altar of storms, one building a barracks, and one building a burrow.
steps.description: Train another peon to go scouting for the enemy (he is always by a gold mine, but some mines are occupied by creeps).

steps.headline: Use your great hall to train six peons and set the rally point on the trees.
steps.description: Just as the builders finish building, send them to the gold mine, but have the last one build another burrow, then send him to the gold mine.

steps.headline: Start summoning your hero and training a few grunts.
steps.description: Take one of the peons gathering lumber and have it make a war-mill real close to the trees. Now start upgrading your great hall.

steps.headline: Level up your hero.
steps.description: Just as your hero and a grunt finishes training, send them to a green dot on the map close to your base. Have them focus on one creep at a time. If you see any chests or books [tomes] drop from the creeps when they die, right click on them. If it is a potion, only use it when you're low on health for health potions, or low on mana with mana potions.

steps.headline: Try attacking an orange dot when you get about three grunts and a level 9-10 hero.
steps.description: When you're creeping, you should build one or two extra burrows.

steps.headline: Get an army.
Do some more leveling.
Further train your army.
Attack.

text:
Put two peons mining gold, one building an altar of storms, one building a barracks, and one building a burrow. Train another peon to go scouting for the enemy (he is always by a gold mine, but some mines are occupied by creeps). Use your great hall to train six peons and set the rally point on the trees. Just as the builders finish building, send them to the gold mine, but have the last one build another burrow, then send him to the gold mine. Start summoning your hero and training a few grunts. Take one of the peons gathering lumber and have it make a war-mill real close to the trees. Now start upgrading your great hall. Level up your hero. Just as your hero and a grunt finishes training, send them to a green dot on the map close to your base. Have them focus on one creep at a time. If you see any chests or books [tomes] drop from the creeps when they die, right click on them. If it is a potion, only use it when you're low on health for health potions, or low on mana with mana potions. Try attacking an orange dot when you get about three grunts and a level 9-10 hero. When you're creeping, you should build one or two extra burrows. Get an army. By now, your town hall should have finished upgrading. Use a peon from the gold mines to build a bestiary and spirit lodge. Summon a second hero at the altar of storms. At the bestiary, research, ensnare, war drums, and envenomed spears. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/95/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/95/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} At the spirit lodge, research witch doctor adept training and shaman adept training. Also, train a few shaman and a couple witch doctors and a couple kodo beasts and raiders. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1b/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/1b/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} While doing this, upgrade your stronghold. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/45/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/4/45/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Do some more leveling. Now, with 2 heroes and 3 grunts, a couple raiders, a couple kodo beasts, a couple witch doctors, and a few shaman you can try creeping red dots. Expand (clear out a gold mine close to your camp, build a great hall there,and train peons to gather gold and lumber). {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/25/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/2/25/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Hunt for enemy expansions if you don't feel like creeping or if all the creeps near your side are gone. While doing this, you should build a few more burrows. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/94/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/94/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Further train your army. When the stronghold finishes, it's your choice if you want the third hero. In the beastiary, train 3-4 wyverns. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/e/e1/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} In the spirit lodge, research shaman master training and witch doctor training, and if any of your units died (other than grunts), replace them. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/08/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/0/08/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet2.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Use a peon to build a tauren totem and research pulverize. After it finishes researching, train 3-4 tauren. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/81/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet3.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/8/81/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet3.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-8Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Attack. With all those units and 2-3 heroes and knowing where the enemy is, you should attack. If the enemy masses towers, bring along a few catapults. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bb/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/b/bb/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet1.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} If you destroy all his towers but the screen doesn't say victory that means he either got a hidden building, a different base hidden somewhere,or a hidden expansion. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/53/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/53/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet2.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Use a goblin laboratory to reveal, or a far seers far sight ability to check out the gold mines. Hunt him down and wait for victory to appear on the screen. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c6/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet3.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/c/c6/Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet3.jpg/aid187037-v4-728px-Win-a-1-vs.-1-Battle-in-Warcraft-3-as-an-Orc-Step-9Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}
